indications: Sodium Sulfacetamide 10% Sulfur 2% Cream is indicated in the topical control of acne vulgaris, acne rosacea and seborrheic dermatitis.
contraindications: Cleanse skin thoroughly before application. Apply a thin layer to affected areas 1-3 times daily or as directed by a physician. To minimize potential dryness, start with one application daily, then gradually increase to 2-3 times daily as needed or as directed by a physician.
warningsAndPrecautions: Sodium Sulfacetamide 10% Sulfur 2% Cream is available in 2 oz (57 g) bottles, NDC 42192-150-02.
adverseReactions: Sodium Sulfacetamide 10% Sulfur 2% Cream is contraindicated for use by patients having known hypersensitivity to sulfonamides, sulfur or any other component of this preparation. Sodium Sulfacetamide 10% Sulfur 2% Cream is not to be used by patients with kidney disease.
name: Sodium Sulfacetamide 10 Sulfur 2 cream
